text: MasterChef Croatia (MasterChef Hrvatska) is a Croatian competitive reality television cooking show based on the original British version of MasterChef.http://www.jutarnji.hr/masterchef-zasad-gledaniji-od-big-brothera-- nova-tv-dobila-prvu-bitku-protiv-rtl-a/933439/ The first episode aired on 21 March 2011 on Nova TV. Host of the first season of Croatian MasterChef is Jasna Nanut. ==Judges== The judges in the first season were Tomislav Gretić, famous Croatian chef, Mate Janković, one of the youngest Croatian chefs and Radovan Marčić, director and writer.http://www.jutarnji.hr/masterchef--mate- jankovic--hrana-nije-seks--nego-predigra/934532/ The winner of the first season was Šime Sušić. The winner of the second season is Nikola Lesar. == Seasons == == Seasons == {|class= wikitable style=center style="text- align:center" |- ! Season ! Season Premiere Date ! Season Finale Date !
